org.drip.math.spline

Class BasisExponentialTension

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.math.spline.ElasticCoefficients
      • org.drip.math.spline.BasisExponentialTension

  • public class BasisExponentialTension
extends ElasticCoefficients
    This class implements the elastic coefficients for the segment using tension exponential basis splines. The segment equation is A * exp (sigma * x) + B * exp (-sigma * x) + C * x + D where is the normalized ordinate mapped as x => (x - x_i-1) / (x_i - x_i-1)
